about_the_game:
Game Description

A game of rogue adventure, mowing, coolness, and walking. A group of characters of different backgrounds and abilities have come together to explore the deepest secrets of this evil unknown planet. Defeat the tidal wave of enemies, different bosses, and achieve various challenges and achievement.

Operating instructions

The game WASD controls character movement. Spaces trigger a sprint.

The game is currently divided into 7 stages[[/h2]
The first four stages are in the scene;
5,6 stages in the scene;
Stage 7 is in the scene.

Characters get a blessing for every 3 levels,
Get up to 8 blessings.
There are currently 16 kinds of blessings in the game.

Characters can obtain treasures, which are available in a variety of ways
Buffs, where specific treasures are combined with specific blessings.
The game currently contains 57 types of treasures.

Regional notes

Shop area can be exchanged for treasures with a blood cap;
Challenge area Rewards for completing challenges;
Treasure area to obtain treasures;
Campfire area triggers regeneration of health;
Trap area Beware of traps and get rewards from them
Hidden area Listen carefully? Where is the treasure?
The tribal area has a large number of monsters and rewards
